titleStmt.title: Dangerfields Dance giving an account of several notorious crimes by him committed, viz, he pretended to be a Duke, and feigned himself to be Monmouth, with several other pranks : for which he was sentence stand in the pillory, to be vvhip'd at the carts arse, and to be sent back to prison.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
